title: "AI music startup Aimi’s app gets an artist-focused update"
excerpt: "We reported on the launch of Aimi in May 2020: it was an app for streaming electronic music which used “AI to generate music using real beats created by real artists”. Its latest update is interesting: under the banner of ‘Aimi+’ it is a premium tier that will offer music from a selection of artists."
